title: Why is the new Prestige K/DA Ahri skin over $170
body: How is it fair that we had an event to be able get Akali and Kai'sa, but when it comes to Ahri, you have to purchase her through paying $170. What's next, Evelynn? I personally think that they should of created an event that would make it so people could get Ahri and Evelynn the same way you could get the rest of group. Their should just be an equal opportunity, that's all.

replies.body: I made a similar post about this. it really annoys me that i wont be able to get this skin.
